ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Apple Engineering Team is looking for an energetic, creative, and self driven Electrical Systems Engineer working on future Display hardware technologies. The candidate will work in a collaborative, exciting environment to integrate new technologies into Apple’s products.

ul.li: - Has completed electronics projects that include the schematic capture and PCB layout - Mixed signal EE design experience at the PCB level - Power converter circuit design and analysis - Select EE components, guide schematic & PCB layout teams, and analyze prototype performance - Hands on lab experience for data analysis and debugging - Experience with simulation tools such as Matlab, Cadence, SPICE, or Ansoft - CPLD implementation experience is a plus - Embedded systems firmware or software programming is a plus - Scripting or Automation is a plus

div.p: - Demonstrate creativity in problem solving, ability to think out-of-box, and adapt quickly to new technical areas - Create and give presentations before and after prototyping new ideas - Analyze the trade-offs between performance and cost - Mentored by senior engineers on design concepts, analysis, and PCB layout - Document component selection, PCB layout, timing diagrams, power on/off sequencing, and test results
MS or BS with 2+ years of relevant EE Design experience
